page.title: 14SPORTS
page.content: {FOOTBALL}I belong to Burbage 84 club.This is a new football club started in 1984. We train at Love Lane every Saturday from 10.30 until 12.00.We practice dribbling, kicking and passing the ball.We shoot at the goal and see how far we can kick and throw the ball. The first year the club was formed we won the league and then went into the final of the Nuneaton cup but unfortunately we lost 4-3. {RUGBY}I play Rugby Union for Hinckley Club.The season is September to March when we attend every Sunday from 10.30 to 12.We practice scrummaging, running, passing, tackling and lineout throws.We play maches in Leicester- shire and Warwickshire.Last season we were the most successful club losing only once. We also played against Grand Quevilly near Rouen in France.
